summary: This is a new follower/spouse for the player. She is an archer and can also heal herself. She can be found in the FrostFruit Inn in Rorikstead.
descriptionHtml:
Thuriel is a hunter that will use bows and the Healing spell to heal herself. She can be found in the Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead. She levels with the player, is available to marry, and should be compatible with any mod. I tested her with Amazing Follower Tweaks along with many other mods and she works just fine.

Her starting equipment is as follows: Fur armor, Forsworn boots, 1 Hunting Bow, 100 Gold, 2 Deer Hides, and 1000 Steel Arrows. I gave her that many arrows so she doesn't run out of them soon after doing some traveling with her. Feel free to take some of those arrows (and the gold) for yourself :)

She should be good for a player that wants an archer watching their back.

This is my first mod that I've ever uploaded, so if there are any problems please let me know and I will try to fix them.

These are the mods (that affect her looks and whatnot) I am using in the pics. These are not a requirement. None of these are made by me, and all credit goes to their respective creators.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] (Curvy)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273/?]Caliente's Vanilla Outfits for CBBE - Calientes Vanilla Armor - Combined Pack v2.1.0[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=197996505]Tanaka the Huntress [/url](Khajiit follower in one of the pics)
author: ChumpChange1992
